sittin nights need my medicine and my needles all the bondsmen keeping it gutta with my peoples the thug life back to back catching misdemeanors the drug life serving junkies in front the cleaners the hospitals nurses tryna lift up my spirit my mama preachin but boosie boo dont wanna hear it hard-headed you know they said i was dead 2 shots up in my head some say i odd off that x what they gon say next grandma died mama house let me talk to ya niggas hate but i dont drive by i walk to ya high school 4 deep in the monte carlo dusted and disgusted tryna make it to tomorrow when i borrowed i gave back when it was bill time i made stacks i-10 to 150 i shake that the baby-mama-drama make me wanna holla plus i lost ass my ghetto role models this my struggle mane
